name: textmapper
short_description: Textmapper is a tool for language development. It generates bottom-up parsers with complete infrastructure from a high-level, declarative specification. Textmapper spreads the generative approach onto different aspects of language design and tries to generate as much derived, boilerplate code as possible. With a little effort you get an abstract syntax tree, code formatters, and even full-featured editor plug-ins for major IDEs.
summary: Textmapper is a tool for language development.
